divs: sighting detailson around about 22:30 hours=10:30pm a sighting over u.s.government property or secure government areas in western missouri and kansas.greater kansas city areas u.s.military personnel had a strange phenomenon sighting a ball shaped object in the skies area military area and this was reported to me.this object was about 3,000 feet in the air and some personnel stated that it was about 200 feet in air .also this object was moving slowly about 20 mph and it was glowing gold color this object was about the size of a car or a compact car others stated and other personnel stated it was a car and gave no size.also this object caused no-electrical black-outs in the areas of kansas city, missouri or kansas city,kansas, no problems with radio or television commuications systems in area.because out of fear going to prison some military personnel want to stay(anonymous) because of the $20,000.00 fine or 15 years in prison or both. \ james allen tutt , jr -mufon field investigator .i.d.# 7606 ---- http:\\jamestu.blog-city.com\ also made no-sound--------------------
